// ** React Imports import { useState } from 'react' // ** Third Party Components import Flatpickr from 'react-flatpickr' import { User, Briefcase, Mail, Calendar, DollarSign, X } from 'react-feather' import { Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, FormGroup, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, Input, Label } from 'reactstrap' // ** Styles import '@Styles/react/libs/flatpickr/flatpickr.scss' const AddNewModal = ({ open, handleModal }) => { // ** State const [Picker, setPicker] = useState(new Date()) // ** Custom close btn const CloseBtn = return (
